text: (yuddhayakadi at adamguvata gat ) numbalage palanaya yatatehi sitina (vahal) kantavan hæra sesu vivahaka kantavan ( samaga vivaha vima tahanam kara æta. eya) numbala kerehi vu allahge niyamayak lesini. movun hærunu vita venat strin (kamaye) varadava hæsirimakin torava numbalage sampat ( mahar pirinæmima) tulin sevima numbalata anumata karana ladi. ebævin ovun samanga kavara deyaka numbala pahasa vindinnehu da e venuven vagakimak vasayen ovunge kuli (mahar) numbala laba denu. (mahar) niyama kala pasu (mahar hi adu vædi kirima sambandhayen) kavara deyak pilibanda va numbala ekineka atara ekangatavata pæminenne da ehi numbalata varadak næta. sæbævinma allah sarva gnaniya sarva pragnavantaya
